In addition the following items from Shu Lin Kou, which were in part covered by our letter of 7 February and CUSA C2-62-0438 concurrence, require Purchase Orders.
Two 1149 forms are in Process and will get to P/SP in due course. Others are available at P/SP,
The two 1149 forms missing from Linkou are,
a) Demounter, tire
b) Cleaner, steam
these forms are being processed in Tainan.
The 1149 form covering trailer-cargo, as well as several others are at or enroute to P/SP. [40.112.213.82
Allocation was as follows :

Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
